Ragnar: I care not of either Autobot or Decepticon history. I am
Ragnar of Clan Ghost Bear. I am a warrior and live as such. Besides,
if all decepticons are even twice as powerful as what you seem to be,
human from where come from would destroy them still very easily. Even
though we are near the base, watch yourself. I can still see you as a
threat and either make you an official prisoner or a dead feline.

There was the sound of a dreadful gauss rifle loading. His tone was
without discussion and his face told he would not tolerate it anymore.
He was way bigger than her and would easily crush her.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 1/17/03 1:56:25 PM Central Standard Time, 
> wingedwarrior41@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Ragnar: Well simply put, my scanners tell me you have some sort of
> > heartbeat, although it is not quite that. And I guess that you mean
> > something else by humans because in none of the recorded history has
> > there been an event of my kind meeting yours. Possibly, there has been
> > a warp through parallel universes when I came here.
> > 
> 
> She smirked. "Humans are humans. Pests. Puny annoying flesh
creatures." she 
> went on. "Of course. YOUR tribes or factions have not done anything.
But in 
> the future... that what I described will happen." She continued to
make her 
> way to where ever they were going. "If you know anything from Autobot 
> history, in which this is actually father into the future, then you
would 
> know what a Decepticon is." She was spilling more of herself than
normal. 
> Perhaps in an attempt to confuse him if not educated the poor fool. 
> 
> "I have to admit, I have known a couple who were nearly worthy of
attention 
> by the Decepticons." she smirked glancing over at him. "Nearly."
